name: Monophobia (itch) (crazyera)
description:
Scratch link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/674529841/

Turbowarp packager: https://packager.turbowarp.org/

This game was made for the Ronocon Game Jam. Inspired by Don't Starve and Minecraft.

Use WASD to move, E to open the inventory, and Q to craft with the recipe on the slider. Click on any food (or bobbing item) in your inventory to eat it. Keep your hunger bar up, because a full bar will heal you and an empty bar will deplete your health. Hold space to break trees or rocks. While breaking a tree with no tools, there's a chance that you can cut your hand. If you can survive for 15 minutes, you will be rescued by a helicopter and therefore win the game.

Thanks to Hero_Holmes360 for hosting the Ronocon Game Jam.

Music: "Cool space music" by @owaiso (Scratch user)
